title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, October 24, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of Denise Levertov (1923), who said, ”in certain ways writing is a form of prayer."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Denise Levertov (1923), who said, ”in certain ways writing is a form of prayer."
